pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to Accompany the 'psych' Package for Psychological Research // Support functions, data sets, and vignettes for the 'psych' package. Contains several of the biggest data sets for the 'psych' package as well as one vignette. A few helper functions for file manipulation are included as well. For more information, see the https://personality-project.org/r web page.
